Take Out User Reviews
The Bigger Place Posted by Anonymous on 06/30/2012
Awesome
Awesome - I get the fish taco platter regularly as part of my standard rotation The Bigger Place Posted by Anonymous on 06/13/2012
Very fresh
I don't understand the bad reviews here. This was by far the cleanest, freshest tasting Mexican food I have had in the city. I had the shrimp tacos and fish tacos platter. The fish and shirimp were very fresh and tasty, and the tortillas were light and obviously homemade. The rice was fluffy and moist, and black beans well seasoned. The atmosphere is definitely casual but has an authentic feel. The Bigger Place Posted by Greenwich St Resident on 10/09/2011
I love this place
Reminds me of simple but delicious meals I enjoyed in Mexico not fancy but very good generous meals. Friendly staff and quick service. They also deliver. Highly recommend the specials. The Bigger Place Posted by Chris on 07/07/2011
Not recommended
Positive: Service was great Negative: This was the most disappointing mexican food I ever had. Had no taste and it seemed like a Fast food restaurant. Value isnt that great. I will never eat here again. The Bigger Place Posted by Christy&Duke on 04/08/2011
The most delectable, divine Sonoran Mexican Cuisine!
Everything on the menu is mouthwatering..... Just like Grandma's kitchen... You can taste the love that is put into it... The perfect amount of flavor in every dish. Mole poblano is a an aromatic dish if you are a chili and chocolate lover to the stuffed peppers... Truly like eating from the movie"Like Water for Chocolate."Allow your palette to fall in love here<3 The Bigger Place Posted by DrTodd on 01/11/2011
Great little place for a Mexican bite
I came across this restaurant when the need arose to find something a carnivore (me) and a vegetarian (my lunch companion) would both like. The soups are fantastic. The service is great. The tamales and fajitas are good but the enchilladas are the thing you can keep coming back to enjoy again and again. I have been there for lunch on four occasions. It is always a great experience. The Bigger Place Posted by Anonymous on 10/21/2010
Below-mediocre
Very poor quality, and absolutely mediocre preparation. I ordered the chicken fajitas. They were actually terrible. I'm truly surprised at the low quality given all the mexican places there are to eat these days. Their salsa was downright bad. Service nice though.
